name: Unchained (itch) (Ovalos)
description:
Simple arcade sidescroller shooter, made for My First Game Jam Summer 2021 (https://itch.io/jam/my-first-game-jam-summer-2021)

Use WASD to move, W or SPACE to jump and the mouse to fire and shoot.

Full credits:

Avenue pixel font by J. D. Jimenez -> https://jdjimenez.itch.io/avenue-pixel

Original sound effects made using ChipTone by SFBGames -> https://sfbgames.itch.io/chiptone

Sound effects Used under Attribution license, from freesound.org -> https://freesound.org/
